```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
mydata <- read.csv("rpg_steam_clean.csv")
head(mydata)
nrow(mydata)
```
```{r}
slim_mydata <- subset(mydata, select = -c(lowest_estimated_owners_number, highest_estimated_owners_number, 	
average_estimated_owners_number))
slim_mydata
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(slim_mydata, aes(x = release_year)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, fill = "skyblue", color = "black") +
  labs(title = "RPGs by Release Year", x = "Year", y = "Number of RPGs Released")
```
